about_the_game:
>In this game where we manage a student, we find ourselves in a dark classroom due to magic. Are you ready to go on this adventure where you will learn what is happening with our character in this mysterious environment? Resist this power against you with your flashlight, which is your only friend in this horrible and dark environment, and try to escape from the school and survive by finding objects that will allow you to move forward and guide you!


>Discover objects in the environment and use them at the right time and place to gain an advantage! For example, pay attention to the battery of your flashlight and try to use it sparingly. Or check the lockers in the school hallways or classrooms. Maybe you will find something useful.
>Be strategic against enemies chasing you and trying to catch you, watch your character's energy bar and run at the right time to gain an advantage over your enemies!
>Enjoy the changing atmosphere and increasing sounds as you progress through the corridors! Control your stress and try to survive in an atmosphere designed to make you nervous and increase your stress level!

name: Stalker Girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
